channel.title: Comments on: The Antlers, 8 months late(r)?

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description:
Yeah, I just sort of stumbled upon them back in January because they covered a bunch of bands I like (Magnetic Fields, My Bloody Valentine, Broadcast).
I, too, am glad to see them getting attention.
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, I just sort of stumbled upon them back in January because they covered a bunch of bands I like (Magnetic Fields, My Bloody Valentine, Broadcast).

I, too, am glad to see them getting attention.

item.title: By: Trey
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description: glad to see these guys getting some attention. I was not familiar with them until this album, but it is pretty safely in my top 10 for the year.
item.content:encoded: glad to see these guys getting some attention. I was not familiar with them until this album, but it is pretty safely in my top 10 for the year.
